text: Jermaine Riley is a British Virgin Islands association football player who plays as a goalkeeper. He plays for Virgin Gorda United and Positive Vibes in the United States Virgin Islands. Riley is also a member of the British Virgin Islands national football team. ==External links== * Category:British Virgin Islands footballers Category:British Virgin Islands international footballers Category:British Virgin Islands expatriate footballers Category:Living people Category:British Virgin Islands expatriates in the United States Virgin Islands Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Virgin Islands Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jermaine Riley
